name: Notion Discipline Builder
description: Want to take your discipline to the next level? With the Discipline Builder for Notion, you'll never have to look anywhere else for Discipline Building Techniques. This template features a multitude of tools and sub-templates to easily track and improve your discipline including: A Struggles and Solutions template for monitoring your struggles and improving on them A Plan board for creating detailed plans for your projects A habit tracker to maintaining good habits, which is key for building dis
features: A Struggles and Solutions template for monitoring your struggles and improving on them; A Plan board for creating detailed plans for your projects; A habit tracker to maintaining good habits, which is key for building discipline; Multiple Minimalistic templates for your projects, notes, and journals that are simple to use
